title: Best My Review for Tampax Pearl Trio Pack Regular
content: This product is by far one of the best Tampax Pearl Trio Pack I gave Ever Used! Great Leakguard protection and comes in 3 different sizes: 18 regular, super, and 8 super, and 8 super plus!
